caseStudies.title: Sandbox Console Redesign
caseStudies.subtitle: Reducing onboarding-to-activation from 2 weeks to 3 days
caseStudies.description: Launched a self-serve billing and subscription management console, consolidating API keys, usage analytics, team roles, wallet, and billing in one place.

content.context: Quicko’s API Sandbox platform required a modernized console to enable developers and businesses to manage subscriptions and usage without support intervention.
content.problem: How can we reduce time-to-value for new customers and empower them with self-serve tools?

process.title: Research
process.description: Analyzed developer onboarding journeys and interviewed customers to identify major blockers.

process.title: Design
process.description: Consolidated multiple workflows into a single dashboard with role-based access and analytics.

process.title: Build & Test
process.description: Iterated with engineering to implement billing, wallet, and API key management. Conducted internal UAT and client pilots.

process.title: Launch
process.description: Rolled out console to all Sandbox clients, monitored adoption metrics, and iterated post-launch.

content.impactDetails: The console reduced support dependency, improved developer experience, and significantly accelerated onboarding-to-activation time.

caseStudies.title: Qpon Campaign Engine
caseStudies.subtitle: Driving upsells with 30k+ user upgrades
caseStudies.description: Built Qpon, a campaign engine for rule-based discount coupons, enabling dynamic marketing strategies and driving conversions.

content.context: Quicko needed a scalable way to run promotional campaigns and upsell users without engineering bottlenecks.
content.problem: How do we build a configurable coupon system flexible enough for marketing while scalable for engineering?

process.title: Scoping
process.description: Worked with marketing to define coupon rules, discount logic, and targeting configurations.

process.title: MVP Build
process.description: Implemented coupon engine with flat and percentage discount support, redemption limits, and usage tracking.

process.title: Adoption
process.description: Enabled marketing to self-serve campaign creation without dev dependencies.

content.impactDetails: Qpon drove 30k+ upgrades and became a key lever for upsell campaigns.

caseStudies.title: Cliq Affiliate Platform Rebuild
caseStudies.subtitle: Enabling 250+ partners to onboard 100k+ customers
caseStudies.description: Rebuilt and scaled Cliq, an affiliate platform with partner tiers, commission triggers, and conditional rewards.

content.context: The legacy affiliate system lacked scalability and configurability for expanding Quicko’s partner ecosystem.
content.problem: How might we rebuild Cliq to handle partner scaling, diverse commission rules, and transparent reporting?

process.title: Discovery
process.description: Benchmarked top affiliate tools and gathered feedback from existing partners.

process.title: Design
process.description: Built condition-based commission models with partner tiers and reward triggers.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: Rolled out to 250+ partners with referral tracking and automated payouts.

content.impactDetails: Cliq enabled partners to scale referrals to 100k+ customers and streamlined affiliate management.

caseStudies.title: AI & Automation Apps
caseStudies.subtitle: Boosting team productivity with AI-driven workflows
caseStudies.description: Developed AI-powered apps and n8n automation workflows to reduce repetitive tasks and enable marketing & ops automation.
caseStudies.team: Solo project with collaboration from Marketing & Ops

impact.timeSaved: Significant reduction in repetitive ops work

content.context: Quicko’s marketing and ops teams faced recurring manual tasks that slowed productivity.
content.problem: How might we leverage AI and workflow automation to eliminate repetitive tasks and free up team bandwidth?

process.title: Automation
process.description: Built n8n workflows to post leads/subscribers to CRMs, email clients, and uptime monitors.

process.title: AI Apps
process.description: Created small AI-powered apps to handle repetitive knowledge work.

process.title: Adoption
process.description: Trained non-technical teams to use these apps via simple GUIs and integrations.

content.impactDetails: Helped non-technical teams reduce ops overhead, speed up campaign execution, and adopt AI-first workflows.

makerProjects.title: Thought Drop
